articles.title: AOC insists opportunity knocks for Australia's 2032 Olympic bid - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: An infrastructure blitz on the way out of the coronavirus downturn could bolster the South East Queensland's already impressive 2032 Olympic bid.
articles.content:
The AOC has backed the Brisbane bid under the caveat that transport links are upgraded, which was already needed in the rapidly growing region.
"This is the opportunity. We always were going to be using existing venues, largely, so it depended on getting the… [+1317 chars]

articles.title: Mike Tyson Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship offer revealed - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Mike Tyson Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship offer revealed
articles.content: Mike Tyson has been offered more than $30 million to come out of retirement and sign up with the controversial Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship. Tyson revealed recently his intent to pull on the gloves again and stage a series of charity fights and special … [+3124 chars]

articles.author: Chris Young
articles.title: 'Complete turd': PGA champ savaged over 'selfish' act - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: Vijay Singh's PGA Tour efforts made him a multi-millionaire, but his plans to enter a lower-level tournament have ruffled a few feathers.
articles.content:
Three-time PGA champion Vijay Singh has been labelled a complete turd by a competitor in a series of since deleted tweets, after Singh was on the entry list for the low-level Korn Ferry Challenge.
The Korn Ferry Challenge, which will be held in Florida, is t… [+2608 chars]

articles.author: AAP
articles.title: Jim Byrne wins at first ride back from injury - Racenet
articles.description: Top jockey Jim Byrne has wasted no time getting back in the winners' circle after an injury plagued start to the year.
articles.content:
Top jockey Jim Byrne has wasted no time getting back in the winners' circle after an injury plagued start to the year.
Byrne was having his first ride back after a second operation on a broken leg when he steered Hollaback Girl ($4.20) to a win in the TAB Fi… [+799 chars]

articles.title: RA to ditch Super Rugby? - RugbyPass
articles.description: Among the shock revelations was the drop in popularity of rugby union as only the ninth most popular sport in the Australian market.
articles.content:
10:58pm, 08 May 2020By NZ Herald
